title: VicTsing Programmable Wireless Gaming Mouse, 7-Button Design, 4800 DPI High Precision Optical Sensor, 5 Adjustable DPI Mice(4800/2000/1600/1200/800), Comfortable Grips, Red
feature: This gaming mouse is compatible for Windows, Mac and Linux: Reliable wireless connection with Nano-receiver that can stay in your laptop. Suitable for your computer, laptop, PC, notebook, macbook
2.4 G Wireless Transmission Technology Privide the fast data transmission and 15M Long Distance Signal.

Up to 15 months of battery life virtually eliminates the need to change batteries. Battery life may vary based on user and computer conditions. The Auto Switch Off function will help you save energy as your Wireless Mouse will switch off when your PC is turned off or the receiver is disconnected.
With 2 DPI buttons, it is easily for you to switch among 5 DPI (4800/2000/1600/1200/800) and flashing light will indicate you which mode you are.
There are two side keys on the mouse, it is default for backward and forward function. Two side buttons can be set for different functions after installing software.
description: This is a new high-grade Wireless Gaming Mouse with max 7 Buttons. Features reliability, ease-of-use, and user comfort, this wireless mouse gives you fast data transmission and no delay or dropouts. You deserve it!If mouse is not used for over 8 minutes, it will turn to power saving mode to save energy.The wireless tiny receiver can be inserted into the slot next to the battery slot, allowing ease of storage when not used.Product Dimension: 128.5*74*41mmType: Wireless Gaming MouseDPI:800/1200/1600/2000/4800Polling Rate: 250hz/125hzWireless Transmission Technology: 2.4GBacklight: YES
